MCFZIB.h File Reference
#include "MCFClass.h"

Classes

class  MCFZIB
 The MCFZIB class derives from the abstract base class MCFClass, thus sharing its (standard) interface, and implements both the primal and dual (revised) network simplex algorithms for solving (Linear) Min Cost Flow problems. More...
 

Macros

#define DYNMC_MCF_ZIB   0
 Decides if the graph topology (arcs, nodes) can be changed. More...
 
#define SWAP_BASKETS   1
 Decide one important details of the pricing implementation. More...
 

Detailed Description

Linear Min Cost Flow problems solver, based on the mcf-1.1 code by Andreas Lobel. Conforms to the standard MCF interface defined in MCFClass.h.

\Version 1.31
